title: GreenChoice
blurb: Find the best food products for you & the planet
description: Find the best food products for you, the planet, & your budget ~ online and in your area. Search or scan to compare products’ impact on your health and the environment. Get suggestions for better alternatives based on your dietary needs, values, and purchases.

title: Matter Music
blurb: Beyond streaming
description: Matter is an all-in-one social music platform with more ways for artists to earn revenue, share content, and connect with fans. Sell beats, sample packs, artwork and more directly from your profile, just one click away from your music.

title: Zooooom.us
blurb: A screensaver for these anxious times
description: Zooooom.us is a great screen saver that will make you anxious and will also save your screen. • “This screen saver is like a beautiful Black Mirror episode.” • “OMG this is so good” • “I almost slammed my laptop a few times”

title: Sketchcase 2.0
blurb: Whiteboard laptop case that doubles as a desktop whiteboard
description: Sketchcase 2.0 is a whiteboard laptop case that doubles as a desktop whiteboard. The Whiteboard Case is anti-graffiti, scratch-resistant, and snaps on in just seconds.

title: Calendazed
blurb: You can’t seize the day if you don’t know what day it is
description: Bring your team together with a revolutionary, all-in-one date management tool. Text "what day is it?" to 31996 to get daily reminders about the day of the week.

title: Upside
blurb: 100% free tool to check the value of your shares and options
description: Upside is an easy-to-use free calculator that helps you figure out how to value your startup shares or options and helps you make a decision on whether to exercise your shares.

title: Cosight 2.0
blurb: Peer feedback from anyone + track improvements over time ⭐
description: Cosight was launched 7 months ago to give everyone a fast and easy way to get peer feedback. Since then, people from all over the world have used Cosight for 360° Peer Reviews and today we're launching 2.0 with several new products.

title: Corona Hunt
blurb: Visualize and compare all countries COVID-19 curves
description: Web's latest stats of 2020 COVID-19 coronavirus from Wuhan, China. It includes confirmed cases, recovered patients and death toll from every country in the world. Charts from the beginning of the virus to actual date.

title: Co-train.space
blurb: Train with your friends online by YouTube video
description: Exercise in groups watching synchronized fitness video on YouTube

title: Composer Pro
blurb: Visual development platform for making enterprise-grade apps
description: Composer Pro is a visual platform to craft React Native and React web-based apps of any complexity, with zero compromises in app quality or sophistication compared to traditional coding. And it’s free forever for indie devs and small companies (<$10M revenue).

title: OnMail
blurb: New email service where you're in control
description: OnMail is designed for the way you live your life today in 2020. It offers the first-of-its-kind Permission-Control feature invented by Edison to ensure that your inbox is your inbox. You get to decide who comes in, and who gets your attention.

title: Direct Memo
blurb: Privately message everyone on your team, instantly.
description: Not everyone sees @channel messages. Perfect for: 📣 Critical announcements 🤗 Periodic 1:1 check-ins 🚨 Time-sensitive tasks 🥰 Community management 📋 Private, team-wide reminders.. and more!

title: Smallstep SSH
blurb: Single Sign-on SSH
description: Single Sign-on SSH

title: Snapup
blurb: Capture anything you want on the web, incredibly quickly
description: Snapup provides smooth interface and functionalities to capture anything you want on the web. You just need an URL.

title: Pinpoint
blurb: Operations dashboard for every engineering team
description: Pinpoint's engineering operations dashboard analyzes activity across tools used to build software to understand how a team’s work is getting done and help engineers identify what needs attention, resolve bottlenecks, mitigate risk, and plan more efficiently.
